content: the black part of the eye to the body round 3 single_crochet increase x 2 14 finish off and leave a long tail for sewing the white part to the body repeat for the other eye attach to the body find the center of the opening 15 stitches from the opening edge this is the midpoint position the eyes so there are three stitches between them use the long tails and tapestry needle to sew the eyes to the body hide tail below eye and through to the inside of the body add eye glint to each eye with white yarn wrapping around a few stitches of the eye essentially a satin embroidery stitch and hiding the tails in the body and tying them together pokeball to poliwag reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin mouth use pink yarn round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 increase x 6 12 finish off and leave a long tail for sewing sew to the body under the eyes and with the bottom just at the top of the white tummy tail use light blue yarn round 1 chain 7 1 turning chain round 2 work in the top legs of the chain stitches 6 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the last chain 5 single_crochet on the other side legs catching the starting tail under these stitches 2 single_crochet in the last chain round 3 increase 5 single_crochet increase x 3 5 single_crochet increase x 2 round 4 single_crochet increase 5 single_crochet single_crochet increase x 3 5 single_crochet single_crochet increase x 2 pokeball to poliwag reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin round 5 2 single_crochet increase 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet increase x 3 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet increase x 2 finish off and weave in end tail attachment piece use blue yarn note this is similar to the start of the tail but slightly different round 1 chain 6 1 turning chain round 2 work in the top legs of the chain stitches 5 single_crochet single_crochet in last chain stitch 5 single_crochet on the other side legs catching the starting tail under these stitches finish off put the slip stitch in the first stitch of the round to close the gap leave a long tail use the natural bend to fold the piece like a hotdog use a tapestry needle to sew together the outside legs of the top you should get a stem/tube like piece when done leave a long tail to attach to the body you can thread the needle through the tube so it s back at the more square end and attach that part of this piece to round 19 of the body shifted down from center to attach the tail piece to the light blue tail use some blue yarn and thread from the inside of the body through the tail attachment piece and exiting through the tip sew
